archimate:Requirement.name: PA.2.3.6b: b) avoiding poorly maintained apps (e.g. by acquiring apps only from developers that have a reputation for diligent app maintenance and effective handling of security issues; requiring developers to produce security updates for the expected life of the app; and considering the termination of apps that are end of life)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
